content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Resource Depot & Smelting Facility at base position (x=-4.5, y=18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-4.5, y=18.5) serving as the central storage depot.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-3.0, y=19.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-4.0, y=21.0) used for processing copper ore into copper plates.

### Automation Lab & Steam Power System (Integrated System)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (x=-7.5, y=18.5) used for submitting Automation Science Packs.
- Boiler at position (x=-5.5, y=24.0) with orientation UP; provides steam with its output at (x=-5.5, y=22.5) (Status: NO_FUEL; Warning: "out of fuel").
- Steam Engine (Generator) at position (x=-0.5, y=24.5) with orientation UP; converts steam into electrical power (Status: NOT_CONNECTED; Warnings: "not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections").
- Offshore Pump at position (x=-7.5, y=25.5) supplying water to the system.
- Electricity Group (id=131) with supporting poles at positions (x=-7.5, y=15.5) and (x=-8.5, y=21.5) for power distribution.
- Pipe Groups:
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=482) at position (x=-10.5, y=16.5), status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=483) at position (x=-12.5, y=18.5), status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=485) at position (x=-8.5, y=20.5) carrying water, status FULL_OUTPUT.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────
- Piping Connection Issues:
  • Ensure that connection points (e.g. between Offshore Pump and Boiler, and between Boiler and Steam Engine) are unblocked, properly aligned, and that sufficient pipe inventory is available (e.g. required 14 pipes versus available count).

- Entity Placement and Spacing:
  • Verify that the target location is clear of obstructions and falls within a valid buildable area before placement to avoid conflicts with existing entities or unplaceable terrain.

- Undefined Entity References:
  • Confirm that all entity reference variables (such as those for the repositioned or new steam engine) are defined and correctly named before performing connection or placement operations.

- Buildable Area Calculation:
  • Access properties correctly without invoking non-callable objects (for example, do not treat a Position object as a function).

- Crafting Dependencies and Resource Verification:
  • Ensure that all required sub-ingredients for crafting (e.g. iron-plate for pipe production) are available or can be produced with existing facilities, and verify that sufficient inventory exists before attempting operations.
